website_summaries.verdict: Fashionable socks for boys that offer good value despite a few longevity concerns.
pros: Affordable boys' socks in bold colors
Cushioning and arch support make them comfortable for hours of wear
Several size options including baby and toddler
cons: Some report unraveling threads with usual wear and washing

customer_reviews.title: Holes in 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were very disappointed with this product. They were purchased in November and by late January all 8 pairs had holes in 1 or both of the socks. Because we live in the Midwest, these socks have pretty much just been worn indoors. Other socks have lasted through all 3 of my boys and these barely lasted 3 months! In this situation, the mantra, "you get what you pay for" holds true. Don't waste your time. Pay a little extra to get socks that were actually designed to hold up to being worn instead of just looking good in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great socks.
customer_reviews.text: Great socks.. Had bought other socks but they shrank with first wash and were very tight ankle , these socks are quality and are very versatile and elegant designs. For those who are looking for socks that dont leave signs on your child foot after wearing them, these are for you.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: After dropping a small fortune on various packages of socks, I finally found some that fit. These fit the length and width of my 4 year old's chubby feet - AND they are not tight around the ankle like the others. Once he turned 2 it was hard to find good fitting socks and i was stretching his baby socks to keep wearing those since only baby socks not tight on ankles. He now has big kid feet wearing these great socks - not too long or short and great width. Not too thick or thin either. I see some reviews show they are tearing but I will buy more if ours do.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Great quality socks for 4.5 year old
customer_reviews.text: Great socks for my 4.5 year old son - the patterns/colors are cute and easy to mix and match with his clothes. The quarter length is nice because it keeps his ankles protected but don’t get too hot under pants. We also bought some Stride Rite athletic looking crew socks for him to wear with shorts (because little boys apparently don’t get cold and insist on wearing shorts during all seasons) - also great quality. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: Great socks.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my four year old son. He is going into size 12 shoes and these socks still fit great. I love that they are colorful to go with all sorts of outfits. I get bored of washing, drying and folding plain white socks. These socks have held up great through months of wear and wash.
customer_reviews.author: L Baker

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great
customer_reviews.text: Socks are soft and comfortable. The one thing I thought is a manufacturing issue, the cardboard that attaches to the first sock in the bunch, has an adhesive that touches the sock. After opening, the adhesive is removed and pulls the threads from the one sock. Causing the threads to come undone.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Millhone

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: These have been my favorite socks in my son’s dresser drawer. The colors and patterns are fun, but not so “childish” that they can’t be dressed up. They’ve held up so well that I’m back to buy the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda T

customer_reviews.title: Good for sock practice.
customer_reviews.text: My son hates putting on socks and hates practicing, especially with socks that are too stretchy and tight (making it hard to get them completely on the foot and pulled up). Thankfully, these have just the right feel and each morning features slightly less resistance before school. That's all I can ask for. Gave 4 stars because I'm not sure about longevity - they do seem slightly thin but with an 8-pack he'll probably outgrow and/or lose them before it matters.
customer_reviews.author: AlBSure

customer_reviews.title: Is it a toddler 10.5 or a boys 10.5 sock size you want!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I guess this was my bad! My grandson is three and considered a toddler and not a little boy, so these socks were way too big for his foot. Shoe and sock sizes are confusing, so check to be sure on the infant, toddler, boys sizes before you buy. I am donating these to a deserving “boy” and going to the brick and mortar store to visually get the right size for his 10.5 toddler sized foot :)
customer_reviews.author: Linda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Your Kid Will Like Them
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like about these socks? They're fun and colorful. Once we gave these socks to my 6-year-old, he didn't want to wear any of his old socks anymore. Buy these socks with confidence. They seem of adequate quality for kids who often run around without shoes, and clearly the price is right or my wife wouldn't have purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Tight ankles
customer_reviews.text: Nice material, ankles too tight. I bought the 3-5 year old size for my almost 2 year old who is skinny and the lower end of typical weight range. The socks are too tight on his ankles and leave marks. I’m not comfortable with him wearing overnight and decided not during the day either. Patterns are cute, just need a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K.

customer_reviews.title: good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: liked the feel and looks of the sock. I thought they were going to be to big when I saw them but we took them out and put them on my grandson and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: thin, soft and not tight
customer_reviews.text: What I liked the most out of these is that the elastic portion above the ankle is not tight as I have noticed in my 4yr old's older socks. These do not leave sock marks above the ankles. I purchased two different sizes/packs and although they were obviously different in length (matching the shoe size) they were both still able to stay put without being too tight.
customer_reviews.author: BHA

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: Great design, great fit, speedy delivery, but did not withstand the test of time! Within 2 months most of them developed a hole after regular use. My son used these pairs with his older pairs and the old pairs still outlasted these. Very disappointed with the quality of these socks. 👎🏽
customer_reviews.author: R.A. Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: careful which color you pick
customer_reviews.text: The gray and blue and white pack has socks that are thicker than the others we got of this brand. My son's feet got hot. We returned them for a different color scheme and those were thinner and the kind we like. They are softer and higher cotton count that the ones we find in the store.
customer_reviews.author: busy mama

customer_reviews.title: The best toddler socks out there!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are fantastic! I love that they are dark colors - great for toddlers. They are true to size - my son is in a size 8T shoe and these are perfect, but have room to grow too. They fit snug and stay in place, but don’t leave imprints from being too tight. They are high quality. They are not too thin and not too thick, just perfect. Thanks Stride Rite and Amazon! :)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Z

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed with these socks for my toddler son. He just turned 3 and wears a size 9 US size. These socks fit perfect. They are soft. The seam at the toe fits in the right spot so it doesn’t irritate the toe when the shoes are on. Very impressed with the quality of material. Very soft even after several washes. And it keeps its form. I will purchase from them going forward
customer_reviews.author: Ariel B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect throw-away socks
customer_reviews.text: If your going on vacation and need socks that don't come back with you, these are it. Sending the kids to summer camp? use these socks since they won't last the whole summer. These socks are cheaply made and develop holes with just a few instances of use.
customer_reviews.author: Sisko

customer_reviews.title: the colors are great and the material is very durable
customer_reviews.text: Well, the colors are great and the material is very durable. I just think I have a little trouble with trying to find the right size for my son. He wears a size 11 sneaker in little boys but these socks are way too big for him to fit into for now. I'm thinking maybe within the next 6 months he might fit into them.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Willis

customer_reviews.title: Holes
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. These socks are really nice looking and appear to be comfortable. I was wanting to love them. My son wore holes in these socks in the first wear in some cases. After a few months, all the pairs now have holes. He has socks in the rotation from Old Navy and GAP that he has used for over two years now that do not have holes, so I was expecting much more. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality material. Every pair began to run in the toe and heel within 3 weeks and some turned into holes within 4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great socks!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are quite durable and seem to stay on a very active preschooler. We have gotten lots of socks that are odd sizes or fall apart easily, but these ones are not either of those. We already purchased the next size up so we have them on standby! Great socks!
customer_reviews.author: S.C.

customer_reviews.title: but after washing them and trying them they were the perfect size. They've been worn for a few weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my five year old and they fit perfectly. They looked too big at first, but after washing them and trying them they were the perfect size. They've been worn for a few weeks and show no signs of aging so I think they'll hold up for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: Awful.
customer_reviews.text: After less than a month of wearing these socks already have holes!! Terrible! He has socks he's worn for years with no holes and these ones have holes after wearing a few times. Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyLegsMomma

customer_reviews.title: Cute but may not last long
customer_reviews.text: These socks are super cute for my toddler. I love the style and the look. However, they do not seem as though they will last him very long as they began pilling after the first wear and wash which was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and fit
customer_reviews.text: Socks look exactly as pictured and fit my 7 year old son perfectly. I would definitely re-order this item.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Stands up to active boys and the washer too!
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors super soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my five year old. He wears an 11.5/12 shoe. I bought size 10-13. They fit him very well, and they are very soft. The colors are vibrant and stay true after several washes. I will definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Honeybee8206

customer_reviews.title: Getting holes after less than 4 months
customer_reviews.text: They don’t last long. I got these for my son in December for a stocking stuffer (currently April) and they are already getting holes in them. On the bottom where the ball and the heel of his foot hit. I really liked them other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Tessaj30

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. The socks are great quality and colors are nice. My 4yo is going through a camouflage stage, so these are perfect. Would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B.O.B.

customer_reviews.title: average product
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing very special about the product. The socks are quite thin, which is ok for summer. The elastic at the top is comfortable and keeps the socks up.
customer_reviews.author: Nic413

customer_reviews.title: Please do not charge again,,  socks WERE returned via UPS Store.
customer_reviews.text: These wee returned for another size, and I received an email notice that they were not returned. This is the only place I see to ask for this to be corrected. Socks are good! Please do not charge me again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon G.

customer_reviews.title: Snags
customer_reviews.text: They snag really easy. As a matter of fact...I removed the sticker holding them together and multiple snags resulted. I would not buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and comfy
customer_reviews.text: They’re super cute and a great fit! They’re comfy and we love camo haha my son is a size 12 in toddler shoes, he’s only 4, so I got the 10-13 size and they fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks but wear sparingly
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 3-year-old. I expected them to be slightly big, and they are, but I wanted him to have a little room to grow. I gave 4 stars simple because after one wear/wash they are starting to get fuzzies on them.
customer_reviews.author: BBLL16

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice weight, wash very well.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 2 year old grandson. The socks are perfect for him. They fit nicely and are good quality. Heavier than most little boys socks. Wash really well and stay on his feet. I will definitely purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Toni H

customer_reviews.title: No shrinkage, but not so bright
customer_reviews.text: These looked much brighter neon green in the photo than in person, but the buddy loves the design and they seem to fit just right. Haven’t noticed shrinkage with washing, but of course they have some pilling. He doesn’t seem affected, and I have yet to find any affordable socks that don’t have that issue.overall fine.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: nice color, but degrading after few washes.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it is years ago, those pairs of socks are not as good as those I bought from the store. After few washes, some parts of the socks are starting to get small balls and the texture is not as tight as new ones. Those I bought directly from store can endure multiple washes.... The color is nice, while I wish the quality can be better.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Field

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Love the darker colors would like them also with no designs on them with the same style if possible (just plain kids colors)? Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Fitted great. But some got holes in them on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fitted great. But some got holes in them on the first time they where worn. I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the boys!
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks!! Bought for my grandson and he is picky and loves them too! They are just the right thickness and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Holds up, even to 2 boys and a mean washer!
customer_reviews.text: We have two boys in the same size socks, so these get a lot of wear! They hold up well after many many many wears and washes (and our washer is not kind on clothes).
customer_reviews.author: Courage Bixler

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I use these socks for my grandson and he love wearing them didn’t shrink when wash or fade and he only 4 years old fit was true to size chart thank you
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Not StrideRite quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased another pack of these after being very happy with the first pack (different color) and these were not as substantial as the other pack. They are thinner socks and they show signs of wear after one use. I expected better quality from Stride Rite.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Prosen

customer_reviews.title: Overall good but don’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected Soft Did not last very long (maybe 3-4 months) which is not very long compared to other socks
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Soft socks
customer_reviews.text: One pair ripped the very first day, but the rest have held up well. They are very soft, even after repeated usage and washing, with no color fading. The ankle part also holds up well and doesn't sag.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great for 7 year old feet
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 7 yr old son who wears size 13 shoes. They are soft and thick. Not cheapy feeling at all. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn M

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: A perfect fit for my son and stands up to his rough ways. I actually ended up buying an additional pack to ensure he had extras.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy from again
customer_reviews.text: The socks arrived in a timely fashion and fit as expected. I would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Jerusha Welborn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Was a little bigger than I expected but he will grow into them. Very good quality and great colors!
customer_reviews.author: Shoshauna

customer_reviews.title: Cute, sturdy socks
customer_reviews.text: We've had them for quite a while and they've held up great. They also provide good (but not too much) padding and haven't gone threadbare like so many other kids socks we own.
customer_reviews.author: Elayne N. Crain

customer_reviews.title: Hole in one pair
customer_reviews.text: One pair came with a hole already. The rest have been fine. Not worth sending it back for one pair.
customer_reviews.author: thefayray

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of the socks. The only reason why I didn’t give them 5 stars was due to the fact that they have a lot of strings on the inside of them from extras threads in them. Otherwise they fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of colors
customer_reviews.text: These socks are sturdy and do not seem to shrink. I can tell they will last a long time. A good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: not quite if size 2 or 3 shoes would fit ...
customer_reviews.text: not quite if size 2 or 3 shoes would fit. I washed them after first use and they shrink significantly. they look the same size as my son's old socks
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fabric, well stitched, my son hasn't put any holes in them in over a month, so awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Nickolas Beckius

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable socks. They seem to wear out sooner it seems, though.
customer_reviews.author: shopper123

customer_reviews.title: Quality toddler socks
customer_reviews.text: Cute patterns, good size for toddlers. Expect them to shrink in the wash! They look like 7-8 size but after the wash, fits my 6-6.5 toddler feet perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Genie M.

customer_reviews.title: Super Nice Socks!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and cushiony soft socks, just what I was hoping to get and more.
customer_reviews.author: Magnet

customer_reviews.title: Love these socks
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks, we have bought each size as our boys have grown. Our boys are just learning to wear their own socks and these seem to last all the pulling and stretching. For the price, a really good deal.
customer_reviews.author: amazonfanboy

customer_reviews.title: Shrinks a bit in dryer
customer_reviews.text: These socks were bought for my 4 yr old son wears a size 9-10. They were great the first two wears. But did shrink a bit. Super thick and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Tina love

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: These socks fit my son's thick foot great. Very comfy and soft for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: A bit small but very good quality socks! Very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Renata

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great socks, wash nicely and don’t fall apart or ball up like cheaper socks. Comfortable for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Newberry

customer_reviews.title: They shrink . Go size up.
customer_reviews.text: My son is a size 10 toddler shoe. I would recommend getting the next size up. They shrink dramatically . And the cuff around the ankle gets tighter which is why I rated it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ansoly

customer_reviews.title: Please check your merchandise before you ship out
customer_reviews.text: Thought the socks was great until, I placed a brand new pair on and out had a hole in it. My son already wore a few pairs so can't return them. But do not ok to receive damage shocks you paid full price for@
customer_reviews.author: chocolate

customer_reviews.title: Mom
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight socks. My son loves them in the summer with sneakers
customer_reviews.author: cycle gal

customer_reviews.title: Two of the socks came with hole in them already.
customer_reviews.text: I expect my child to wear holes into his socks...but not for brand new socks to arrive with holes in them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Zelony

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and colors but
customer_reviews.text: Wash them inside out couple times they tend to leave threads on kid feet after wearing them but afterwards no issues
customer_reviews.author: Geronimo

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I can always count on Stride Rite socks for our grandchildren: Fit is true to quoted shoe size, quality construction, nice heel fit, and they keep their shape and structure through countless washings. Have bought these socks multiple times and always happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Sock
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality socks for busy children. My son wears his cloths out fast and these socks are hanging in there. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: T Arch

customer_reviews.title: These are a nice light-weight sock but they are way too big for ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice light-weight sock but they are way too big for children wearing a toddler shoe size 10. Putting them aside until the kids are bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Luke N.

customer_reviews.title: They fit my son well
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 5 year old (size 13) and he says they are comfortable and they fit well. I had also bought my daughter some from this brand and so far no disappointments!
customer_reviews.author: FamilyOfFun

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good. Just as pictured. Colors are vibrant. Love the option of socks without the numbers and grippers on bottom! Keep making these.
customer_reviews.author: GoodMorningLife234

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice socks. Just wish they were all alike. We always seem to have a sock missing.
customer_reviews.author: L. C. Putman

customer_reviews.title: Holey
customer_reviews.text: My son likes the styles a lot but after a month one already has a hole.
customer_reviews.author: Whoa3isAlot

customer_reviews.title: Good toddler socks
customer_reviews.text: Cute and soft! They fit very well and cover the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: GabPC

customer_reviews.title: They’re great socks! Can’t wait until we can use them
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem shopping for socks I guess. I thought these were for little boys and would fit a size 11 shoe. And they will but not until my little boy is about 5 years older. Maybe socks should be sized by approximate grade instead. They’re great socks! Can’t wait until we can use them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I buy this socks with different size. The quality is very good. My boy loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picky son approved
customer_reviews.text: My son is super picky about socks and loves these!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Doane

customer_reviews.title: I like them with a little room to grow
customer_reviews.text: These fit my almost 2-year-old well enough, but are very slightly big. That said, he has big feet for his age - wears a size 7 toddler shoe. I like them with a little room to grow. I also like that these are fairly thin, so he can wear him with his sneakers in the summer and his feet aren't too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best socks for my son
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect and fits exactly how I expected. The material is very good after the wash. I like the colors and it’s exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice soft socks!
customer_reviews.text: my son likes them nice colors, correct size - my son wears kids size 11.
customer_reviews.author: Gkpawar

customer_reviews.title: Heavy socks
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit heavier than i thought they would be, but i hope that means they will last! Great for my son and the winter months
customer_reviews.author: IowaKay

customer_reviews.title: Buy!
customer_reviews.text: My son has big feet for his age and I always struggle to find the right socks. These are good quality and don’t shrink or fade quickly. Good Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Great for children that say other socks ich like mine. These were anawered prayers they want to wear socks again
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Brooks

customer_reviews.title: High quality socks
customer_reviews.text: These are nicer than I expected. The socks fit well and the fabric looks durable and high-quality, unlike other children's socks I've purchased online. I would definitely recommend these and plan to buy again when it's time for the next size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Sizing was bigger than I expected. But they will grow into them!
customer_reviews.author: S. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great design and soft feel
customer_reviews.text: These socks are excellent. They are soft and fit well. My son loves them. I'm jealous of their cool design and soft feel.
customer_reviews.author: Eman Sanatkar

customer_reviews.title: Keeping feet warm
customer_reviews.text: Bought for stocking stuffer and split between 2 grandsons. Very nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Howdy06mom

customer_reviews.title: These socks run very large
customer_reviews.text: The description says shoe size 10-13. My son wears a size 11 shoe so he should have theoretically been near the sweet spot. The socks are not even close to fitting...way too big. The socks were very soft and would probably be excellent if they were sized correctly.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Love! :)
customer_reviews.text: Best little boy socks! Very good quality, soft, and cushiony.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great socks for a fun loving boy
customer_reviews.text: My 4 1/2 year old selected these socks himself. He loves them. Soft and nice set.
customer_reviews.author: C. Adams

customer_reviews.title: These are wondrful!
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks. The color assortment is great and what was mist important to me they fit great and they are not too tight. They do not leave imprints when I take them iff my little ones feet. Highly recommend them! I wish the company made knee highs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jelena Djeric

customer_reviews.title: Fit might be a bit small; also possible that my kid's foot has grown and I am only realizing it as I type this
customer_reviews.text: Quality fabric, nice prints. They looked like they might be too big out of the package but seemed to shrink up a fair amount in the first wash. They might even be a bit too small if they continue to shrink.
customer_reviews.author: miggs report

customer_reviews.title: My boys love the colors and feel of these
customer_reviews.text: My boys love the colors and feel of these. They go through a LOT of sox and it helps to have such a variety of patterns to make matching-socks easy.
customer_reviews.author: Liana Hall

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sock that lasts
customer_reviews.text: My son has been wearing these socks for a year now and they hold up with a 3 year old playing hard in them. Good quality sock that lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great socks.
customer_reviews.text: Great socks. Well made. Soft and comfy. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy M

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my wide footed 5 year old they’re awesome ! Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Abby Karbon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality of these socks. I got two pairs for my older two sons. They love the colors and the fit is great.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Davis

product_meta.title: Stride Rite Boys' 8-Pack Socks
product_meta.description: The cotton rich blend is designed to last and keep its shape even after washing.
feature_bullets: Made from high quality materials to combat wear and tear
Our socks stay on and retain their shape when washed
